text: Mother () is a 1955 Soviet drama movie directed by Mark Donskoy.Виктор Сухоруков: Вы напрасно требуете от меня какой-то пародии на Ленина!МАТЬ (1955) It stars Vera Maretskaya, Aleksey Batalov, and Tatyana Piletskaya. The movie is based on the 1906 eponymous novel by Maxim Gorky. ==Actors== * Vera Maretskaya as Pelagea Nilovna Vlassovna, the mother * Aleksey Batalov as Pavel Vlassov * Tatyana Piletskaya as Sasha == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1955 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Mark Donskoy
title: Mother (1955 movie)
